title: cast publish json output in async mode
body:
### Component

Cast

### Describe the feature you would like

Now if you publishing manually signed transaction to chain using `cast publish --async` command output will be unusable for machine/scripting (you have to apply regexp to be able to grab `tx_hash`.

Example:
```
PendingTransaction { tx_hash: 0x8609a8acfef6f943918f680c5e2e935a112f30c2b00ad1fb66778fe210f7b2d5, confirmations: 1, state: PendingTxState { state: "InitialDelay" } }
```

Is it possible to add json (`-j` or `--json` flag to this command to receive async result in JSON format.

Or just return `tx_hash` without any other information.

But if you using `cast publish` in sync mode (without `--async` option) you will receive JSON output from `cast receipt`

Example:
```
{"blockHash":"0xe960b62fb47b828dc0ac0b69f6d8e8da6ff991bd7fd879ff0fa91d61107ab0a1","blockNumber":"0x14","contractAddress":null,"cumulativeGasUsed":"0x8c46","effectiveGasPrice":"0x4d036440","from":"0x1bb90cde8a032cb4963813a5b4db4981afa5b9c6","gasUsed":"0x8c46","logs":[],"logsBloom":"","status":"0x0","to":"0x659d4343c656beafb2441c50a0fb3d513374fe66","transactionHash":"0xb751b1d8fba3643fd8288f33921f5827c69b6232ba08334b7993a8f8a9674c49","transactionIndex":"0x0","type":"0x0"}
```
